summary: Route nginx FastCGI traffic to php-fpm task DNS during deploys

changes.description: Deploy-time app-image reuse now validates the `org.magezero.cloud_swarm_ref` label on both `mz-magento` and `mz-nginx-app`. If the current `cloud-swarm` checkout changed under the same artifact tag, the deploy rebuilds the Magento app images instead of incorrectly reusing stale ones.
Deploy-time nginx env now pins `MZ_PHP_FPM_HOST` and `MZ_PHP_FPM_ADMIN_HOST` to `tasks.php-fpm` and `tasks.php-fpm-admin` so rollouts do not fall back to the Swarm service VIP path.
